heading: 2 Introduction

can label chapter section titles using {#label} , e.g., can reference Chapter 2. manually label , automatic labels anyway, e.g., Chapter 3.See 2.1 simple leaflet map

Reference figure code chunk label fig: prefix, e.g., see Figure 2.2. Similarly, can reference tables generated knitr::kable(), e.g., see Table 2.1.Table 2.1: nice table!
code:
library(leaflet)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=174.768, lat=-36.852, popup="The birthplace of R")
par(mar = c(4, 4, .1, .1))
plot(pressure, type = 'b', pch = 19)
knitr::kable(
  head(iris, 20), caption = 'Here is a nice table!',
  booktabs = TRUE
)
